Name: Surely You're Joking, Mr. Feynman!
Genre: Variety of instance in Feynman's life
Author: Richard Feynman
Description: I found his life so cool. Touches different experiences of life from picking up from bar to  Manhattan project

Name: Programming Ground Up
Author: Jonathan Bartlett
Description: Deep Dive to Architecture and how computer works?

Name: Hitchhikers Guide to Galaxy
Author: Douglas Adams
Description: It talks about the biggest question Meaning of life in most humorous way possible makes us to thing in different perspective

Name: Brief Answers to the Big Questions
Author: Stephen Hawking
Description: I really like some of the takes on big question like is there god? and Does alien exist?

Name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
Author: Robert Kiyosaki and Sharon L. Lechter
Description: A book about how rich person is different from a poor one what do they do different with money,about making the money work rather that working for money
